entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who intervened before Ron could answer back. He is described as saying 'Dumbledore'd bewitched this branch to burn ever-more...'

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned by Hagrid as the one who bewitched the branch and sent a gift to Karkus. He is described as having 'warned us tha' migh' ha ppen.'

entities.name: karkus
entities.description: Karkus is introduced as the one who received the gift from Dumbledore. It is mentioned that he did not speak English.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who was about to answer back when Hagrid intervened.

relationships.description: Hagrid mentions that Dumbledore bewitched the branch and sent it as a gift to Karkus.
Karkus received the gift from Hagrid, who was acting on behalf of Dumbledore.
